verses.name: Jeremiah 37:18
verses.text: Moreover Jeremiah said unto king Zedekiah, What have I offended against thee, or against thy servants, or against this people, that ye have put me in prison?

verses.name: Jeremiah 37:19
verses.text: Where are now your prophets which prophesied unto you, saying, The king of Babylon shall not come against you, nor against this land?

verses.name: Jeremiah 37:20
verses.text: Therefore hear now, I pray thee, O my lord the king: let my supplication, I pray thee, be accepted before thee; that thou cause me not to return to the house of Jonathan the scribe, lest I die there.
